headline: Invitation Homes Announces Pricing of $600 Million of 4.950% Senior Notes due 2033
summary: DALLAS, August 12, 2025--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes," the "Company," or "our") announced today that its operating partnership, Invitation Homes Operating Partnership LP (the "Operating Partnership"), has priced a public offering of $600 million aggregate principal amount of 4.950% Senior Notes due 2033 (the "Notes"). The Notes were priced at 99.477% of the principal amount and will mature on January 15, 2033. The offering is expected to close on August 15, 2025, subjec
